It would take the chakra of the strongest of the Uzumaki clan being infused within a seal tag, that could ever remove a mask past the three day mark.

The Uzumaki found the risk of the masks, out weighted that of the reward. They sealed the knowledge of the jutsu needed to create the masks in the scroll.

Naruto finished reading the scroll and was amazed at what he found. Not only did he learn some of his clan's history, he also learned of a new clan jutsu as well. Realizing the risk of leaving such a risky jutsu around, he decides to roll the scroll back up and bring it back to the village. He knew it could be potentially dangerous if it made it into the wrong hands.

Naruto exits with the shrine and begins to make his way back to village. As he makes his way back he starts to begin thinking of the mask jutsu. 1121.content:
Raising the single strand of hair to the sunlight streaming through his window, he deduced the color to be an unmistakable shade of pink. Such a unique and vibrant coloring was known to only one person throughout the whole of the Hidden Leaf Village, his longtime teammate and former crush, Haruno Sakura. He had been in physical contact with his bubblegum haired teammate multiple times throughout the time of strife that was the Fourth Shinobi World War, so it was hardly a surprise that a strand of Sakura's exotically colored hair could've gotten snagged on of his ratty old jacket's zipper.

"Sakura-chan, huh..." he mumbled to himself, leaning over and placing the hair on the meticulously drawn sealing array.

"Glad Ero-Sennin managed to beat sealing into my head or else this'd be kinda useless," he mused aloud, slapping his hands together, closing his eyes, and focusing his chakra.

Soon a deep blue glow surrounded his hands, bathing the dimly lit room in its azure light. Eyes snapping open, Naruto slammed his palms down at the edge of the array.

"Uzumaki Hijustu: Men no Sakusei!*"

His chakra spread along the array like lightning, converging from all corners of the circular array onto the single strand of pink laying in the center. The blue light became blindingly white and for a brief moment, Naruto was afraid he'd made a mistake with the array. And as Jiraiya had beat into his hard noggin, a single, minute mistake on an array could be deadly.

But his fears proved to be unfounded as the white light flared a bright pink, the same color as the hair, before abruptly vanishing into the array.

POOF

A small cloud of pink smoke erupted from the center of the array, signifying the success of the jutsu. With bated breath, Naruto watched the cloud of smoke vanish, revealing the results of his efforts.

"Damn," he mumbled in sheer wonderment as he picked up the mask, "I didn't expect it to work..."

The mask in his hands was relatively simple looking, but very distinctly possessing the features of his teammate. It was heart shaped, the "skin" colored a familiar shade of lily white, both telltale features of his teammate. The eyeholes were large and almond shaped, framed by thick, full lashes and the mouth was a small line of pink against the fairer shade of the mask's "skin". But obviously, the most distinguishing feature was the long, chin length, pink bangs that were parted in the center and framed the face.

"Woah," he whispered in awe, turning the mask over in his hands.

The inside of the mask was the color of dark wood, which flickered oddly in the dim light of his apartment.

Turning it back around, he now wondered...

...what to do with it, now that he'd created a mask of his teammate?

Hinata ran to the gate and was shocked at what she saw. Many of her fellow Leaf ninja were scattered about, some injured, others knocked unconscious. At the center of it all Hinata could make out what appeared to be their current Hokage Kakashi, fighting with a man in a white cloak, slivery white hair, and what appeared to have small horns from his head. Kakashi and the man were caught in a virtual stalemate. Hinata was amazed that there was someone that could match Kakashi in strength.

Kakashi couldn't believe his luck. After the Forth Great Ninja War, the leaf village was low on new ninja recruits and had to spread its forces a little thin. Luckily it was a time of relative peace, so need ninja weren't exactly great. Recently there had been a strange number of attacks happening around the elemental nations, and many villages were low on forces, so Kakashi had sent out a lot of their current Leaf ninja to assist. Unfortunately, this left the village understaffed and left him in the predicament he was currently in with many of the Leaf's stronger and more prominent ninja out of the village on missions and it left both Sakura and Tsunade to attend to the injured. Throughout the fight, Kakashi had learned that his opponent was a failed clone experiment of Orochimaru to create someone based on that of the Ootsutsuki clan. Once the clone had realized its power though, it quickly abandoned Orochimaru and began to go on a rampage due to his power making him mentally unstable. He was strong, and had no control over his power. He eventually made is way to the Leaf village in search of Naruto or Sasuke, wanting to kill them to prove he was strongest being around. Now the clone was attacking the village trying to find out their whereabouts.

Kakashi knew the Ootsutsuki were strong, but this man was on another level. Kakashi was barely able to keep up with him and knew he would reach his limit soon. For this I cannot forgive. Remember this power as you take it with you to your grave. My new power. The power of Kaguya!" She yelled , and then stabbed him with the bone sword. "All-Killing Ash Bones." Was the last thing he heard as his body began to dissolve and rot away.

Hinata was happy, she had defeated the enemy and still felt the unlimited power that flowed through her body, but then began to frown as she looked at all the destruction the clone had created. She wished there was something she could do with this power to fix it. It was then she felt her body begin to go on autopilot. All the injuries accrued were healed, as if they had never received them. It was almost like Hinata reset everything to prior the clones arrival.

"How did you know of the mask?" asked Hinata. "Naruto briefed me before his mission, he told me he left it in your care, that there was no one he trusted more. He told me how it works as well. Now that the village is safe Hinata, you need to remove the mask. For your safety and everyone's in the village."

"Safety?! I protected the village! Even better than you Hokage!" She snapped. "Hinata this isn't you, Naruto warned us both of the personality taking over the user. Kaguya's power is strong and will exert its will on you. I've fought once and its not something I want to see again. So I will ask you again Hinata. Please remove the mask."

Kakashi then stared her down and said, "Hinata for your own good, I'll tell you one more time, remove the mask or I will do it for you." He cursed knowing he was done for. He felt himself blacking out as he was caught in a genjutsu similar to a limited Tsukuyomi.

As Kakashi raised his hands to try and remove the mask from her, she felt a pulse come from her third eye and with knowledge she never originally had, placed Kakashi under one of her now strongest genjutsus. She watched as Kakashi drop to the ground, his mind locked away in an endless dream that only she could wake him up from. She heard everyone gasp at the sight of their fallen Hokage. Realizing she had everyone exactly where she wanted them, Hinata then began to hover above the ground so that all in the area could see, she said, "Our mighty Hokage has fallen to my power. As you saw, it my power that protected you from the intruder, it was I who rebuilt the village and healed your injured. It was all through my new power that the village is safe, not Kakashi. I am the only one that can protect this village from here on out. I shall be the new Hokage, and as long as you follow my word as law, you shall have nothing to fear!" Hinata finished.

The villagers and the the leaf ninja were paralyzed in fear. Hinata had taken out the Hokage without so much as lifting a finger. What could they do against a power like that. One by one the citizens of the leaf began to bow their heads to the newly proclaimed Hokage. That was until a voice called in opposition. That person was...

11231221111121.content:
"Bullshit!" Hinata heard someone say. She looked to see where it came from. She eventually saw that it was Sakura. "How could you do this Hinata? To take out Kakashi-sensei as Hokage and to declare yourself though the fear of others? Thats not what a true Hokage would do, and its certainly not what the real Hinata would do!" yelled Sakura. Hinata then gave her an amused look. She then created a portal next to her and appeared right behind Sakura. "Kakashi was weak and could never protect the village as well as I can. This power is," said Hinata as she was cut off by Sakura. "Not yours! Its Kaguya's and its messing with your mind Hinata. " Hinata looked at her with anger, "This is my power, together with it I am Kaguya and I won't let you or anyone else in this village say different." Hinata then looked and saw some of the other ninja's and villagers start to rally behind Sakura. Losing the fear she had instilled in them prior, Hinata decided she would make Sakura an example to all who opposed her. Using gravity manipulation, she surprised Sakura by raising her hand and casting Sakura up into the air. While Sakura hovered for all to see, she struggled for all to see as Hinata then raised her other hand and launched a sphere of pitch black chakra. The orb engulfed Sakura as she let out a scream. In mere moments the sphere then shrank down into nothing leaving behind no trace of Sakura. Everyone gasped at the demise of Sakura. To some some it shocked, to others it enraged. For Hinata, it created the opposite effect than what she was expecting. Everyone was now in an uproar of the public execution of one of their own. Realizing fear would no longer work, another idea crept into her head. She launched a small dark orb above the village, beginning the Chibaku Tensei jutsu. It began to create a miniature moon-like object hovering above the village. This caused everyone to stop and notice the the object became large enough to eclipse the sun casting a shadow on the village. Hinata then turned towards the miniature moon and opened her Rinne Sharingan. She then cast a massive genjutsu that reflected off the moon and affected everyone person in the village leaving them in a trance like state. It was then that Hinata turned back to the village and spoke, "People of the village, from this day forward you obey my every command with out question, and in return I will keep you safe. With this decree I will no longer be the weak Hinata you originally remembered. From this day forward, I will be your new as Kaguya, your new Hokage!" Everyone in the village began to come to, as they saw their new Hokage and began to cheer and chant her name.

Pleased with the turn out, The new Kaguya, warped to the Hokage building where she went to the top of it. Using her powers she began to warp the building into a new palace. Pleased she warped into her new room in the palace. She looked down at her bed and placed out her hand, a black sphere again appeared and from it the unconcious body of Sakura dropped on to the bed. The new Kaguya looked at her and spoke, "Well Sakura, when I was Hinata we had actually become pretty good friends. You helped me out then, so I couldn't actually kill you. You are still a good friend and will be useful in the future." With that Kaguya leaves the unconscious Sakura on the bed an opens a portal. She enters it, only to appear...

Hinata knew Sakura had seen first hand Kaguya's true power and could be apprehensive about using the mask, but with the greater sense of urgency she might reconsider. She was someone who was strong willed and could potentially wield the power that the piece of the mask contained as well Hinata thought. She looked up and saw the cloned Ootsutsuki standing over the motionless body of Kakashi. Realizing that time was almost up, Hinata made up her mind. She yelled out to Sakura…
1123122111131.title: It was Sakura

choices: The Vortexes start to move closer together and merge.
11231221111312.content:
Hinata looked up and saw the cloned Ootsutsuki standing over the motionless body of Kakashi. Realizing that time was almost up, Hinata made up her mind. She looked over and yelled out to Sakura grabbing both her and the intruder’s attention. He casually dropped Kakashi’s body as he stared curiously at her. Hinata gulped as a wave of intruder’s killing intent rolled over her. Steeling her resolve Hinata continued, “Sakura! Quickly, one foot to left of you is the other half of this mask, I need you to grab it!” she yelled while holding up her piece. Sakura was shocked by the half faced appearance of Kaguya’s face in Hinata’s hand. She then looked down and saw the half Hinata mentioned. Questions began racing through Sakura’s head. Why did Hinata have a mask of Kaguya, and why would she bring it to a war zone like this? What purpose did it have. The only thing she did know was if it involved Kaguya, it was probably bad. Seeing the look on Sakura’s face, Hinata could already tell what she was thinking. She then yelled out to her, “Sakura! I need you to wear your half of the mask. I know you have seen Kaguya’s power personally, but you have to trust me. In our hands hold the pieces to possibly help save the village and Kakashi. Please listen to me!” Realizing Hinata wouldn’t be asking this of she didn’t have some plan or idea of it these pieces worked, Sakura bent over and took the other piece of the mask. As soon as her hand made contact with the other half, she felt a light pulse emanate from it. Hinata felt her half pulse again as well. They both looked down at the halves in their hands when they felt the halves pulse again, but it was a stronger feeling this time. Both sets of eyes started to haze over as their hearts started pounding in their chests.

The Ootsutsuki clone’s mood changed from being curious of the two girls girls standing in the rubble, to that of his normal, insane and murderous rage. He then went sprinting towards Hinata with makeshift sword in hand. This snapped both girls out of their trance. Realizing no other way to save her, Sakura yelled out as she held her half to her face, “Ah screw it! Hinata I’ll do it!” Hearing that was all Hinata needed she quickly put her half up to her face as well. Just as the clone got in front of Hinata, she and Sakura yelled, “Now!” simultaneously and they each both put on their respective halves. A burst of energy and chakra exploded from both girls, blowing back the clone through several buildings, as a vortex dense malevolent chakra began to encircle and envelop the each of them. The vortexes began to shroud their form showing nothing but that of their silhouettes.

The Kaguya mask halves latched on slapping violently onto Hinata’s and Sakura’s faces, they both let out a loud low groan. Stumbling backwards in the vortexes they recoiled from the impact, as the once ornate mask halves clamped firmly around the single side of their heads. Each one shuddered and creaked launching small tendrils that clamped around their heads, beginning to writhe and knead into their facial features. Loud moans echoed from the vortexes as they could feel their chakra being violently and forcefully drawn from within their bodies. The Mask halves began to soften taking on a more elastic flesh like feeling as it pressed harshly into their faces, kneading and mould at their soft facial features. Hinata and Sakura winced uncomfortably as the pieces continued to writhe atop their faces, creaking and cracking as it slowly slivered across the uncovered portions of their faces. Hinata and Sakura again moaned loudly, feeling their own drawn chakra swirling and mixing with the stored chakra in the halves.

What begins to happen now?

(All credit for writing out the transformation scenes in this story goes to Mwander [Username: maskedwander] for the huge assist in this collaborative effort. Once again, a big thanks to him for the help.)

Floundering forward knocked off balance by her shifting spine Sakura perceived a vast warming feeling in her bust, comprehending what this likely signaled she jutted her chest outwards in preparation. She panted and moaned pleasurably as her meagre bosoms briskly swelled forth, rapidly filling her sleeveless dress. Straining the frayed fabric as it tore ripping open exposing her undergarments. Across in the other vortex Hinata also felt a sensation welling in her bust, the warm feeling spreading promptly as she panted lightly. Moaning aloud in pure pleasure Hinata’s already sizable bosom developed even further, her blouse unable to cope with the stress busting open as well exposing her. Both ladies convulsed as their bones grinded against each other their heights slowly altering to match Kaguya’s. Their waist snapped in sending a sicking sound rippling outwards. Their nails creaked as they elongated taking light painted tones that matched their hair.

The chakra vortex around them continuing to rip, tear and gash at what little was left of their gear. Reducing them to an almost completely bare nude state, their only remaining modesty preserved by the tattered shreds of their grabs. Hinata and Sakura blushed, sweating and panting profusely from the yet warn off pleasurable surge of their enlarged bosoms. Their adult bodies now more matured and voluptuous. However unable to long appreciate their current endowment as they shook viciously. The swirling whirlwind of chakra surrounded them, ascending them upwards hovering a few feet into the savage vortex. Firmly clamping their heads again trying to steady themselves the squirming mask settled atop their anguished expressions. Abruptly Hinata and Sakura thrashed about intensely, howling in a low resounding tone. Hinata’s Byakugan eyes glazed over, her veins bulged prominently. Sakura’s irises dissipated as the natural veins around her eyes forcefully bulged out hastily, her emerald eyes glazing over as a powerful pulse burst emanated from them. The sudden adaptation and adoption of the Byakugan Kekkei Genkai provoked blood to slightly rupture from Sakura’s eyes, unaccustomed to such powerful sensory input. Both their eyes twitched excessively as if something was trying to break to the surface from inside their skulls. A trickle of blood unevenly ran down their foreheads. Consumed by a great upsurge of chakra their remaining battered underwear burned away, exposing their concealed voluptuous sensuous physique underneath.

Screeching out together Sakura’s and Hinata Rinne Sharingan eyes snapped wide. Their new wicked wayward chakra oozed out of their forms. Embracing them in a thick cloud like cloak the chakra grew more solid, materialising around them into unfamiliar garments. Sakura’s outfit consisted of a kimono that was short and stopped perilously short down her thighs. revealing much of her sensual legs. A large bow wrapped tightly around her waist modestly holding the outfit together. Her long sleeves ended at thin delicate formal gloves that stretched out gracefully. Hinata’s outfit consisted of a much more form fitting Kimono than Sakura’s, displaying immodestly all her provocative curves. The front of the kimono ample and wide open flaunting much of her bosom and embellish cleavage. Contrasting to Sakura her Kimono swept long down past her thighs and exaggerated amplifying her contours. All of a sudden a bright radiance burned from their Rinne Sharingans. A brilliant dazzling light erupted from the centre of the whirlwinds, shattering the vortexes sending dust flying high into the air.

Since the start of the two young shinobi donning the strange mysterious half masks, vanishing into thick obscured cyclones of erratic chakra nobody had seen too much of them. The people followed and watched as the figures within the vortexes writhed, throbbing about their hands grappling with their heads as what looks like their hair shifted and inexplicable appendages formed. Throughout the crisis sadistic snapping, sickening scream, ghastly groans and appalling creaking echoed outwards past them. The silhouettes of the young women dislocating and adjusting, as if being shaped by a large unseen hand. Transforming into unrecognisable shapes and enamouring contours. However that all changed as the cyclones dissipated suddenly with two roaring banshee like screams as dust filled the air.

Clearing away the dust settled on the ground forming a thin layer which covered everything like ash. Descending down from shimmering sunlit sky arose two equivalent figures clad in graceful snow kimonos, floating tenderly in the air. Touching down quietly the two figures just stood their, ominously casting their presence around everyone. They felt as if two Goddesses had just swooped down from Heaven. Hinata and Sakura raised their hands up out in front of them, admiring the absolute feeling of strength and power that followed throughout their bodies. They realized quickly it wasn’t the complete capability of Kaguya, but amounted to far more than the single meagre efforts of Hagoromo and Hamura Ootsutsuki.on their own. However this admiration of their new abilities would have to be short lived for the moment as crashing down in front of them appear the cloned Ootsutsuki, slightly grazed from his earlier trip through several building. In perfect complete synchronization Hinata and Sakura trod one leg forward, steadying themselves and extending in front of them their arms stretching out their hands they commanded.
“Begone from our sight you beast!” in an echoed tone.

All of a sudden a blinding flash of light consumed the clone, obscuring him in a funnel of light as his body crumbled. Turning to ash burned by the sheer intensity of the combined force of Sakura and Hinata’s combined strength. As the cinders dissipated and fluttered away on the light breeze that swept through the two women lowered their arms and looked at each other. They grinned, giggling cheerfully as they realized they were victorious. The threat was vanquished and everyone saved. Or was it?

The mask sat there on Hinata's bed undisturbed, empty eye holes staring at the ceiling, inanimate. A mask based on the strongest woman to ever live in the shinobi nations, containing a vast and terrible power. 112312211121.content:
The door to Hinata's room slides open, revealing it to be none other than her sister Hanabi. Hanabi had just recently come back from a mission late last night and had been sleeping all day in her room. When the rumble and explosion went off she had awoken, only to find an empty house. Assuming something might have happened she went to check on her sister to make sure she was alright. She approached Hinata's room and knocked on her door and heard nothing. Wanting to make sure everything was okay, she entered Hinata's room to see if she was there. She found an empty room upon entry, but was greeted with the sight of a mask sitting on top her sister's bed.

Hanabi looked at the mask and tried to determine what it was, and why Hinata had it. She inspected the mask. It had delicate facial features and what looked like white bangs that framed its face. It had empty eyes hole, like most masks, and a slit on its forehead that looked like it belong to a closed third eye. The mask looked strange to Hanabi, but oddly familiar. The pale skin and white hair reminded her of that Tonrei Ootsutsuki that kidnapped her and brought her to the moon. It was at that moment something clicked and she remembered the story Hinata told her, that she heard from Naruto. It was about the clash with Kaguya, and what happened when everyone was caught in the Infinite Tsukuyomi. No one other than the members of Team 7 had actually saw Kaguya, but based on the description and this mask, Hanabi now had a pretty good idea.

Hanabi began to wonder why her sister had such a mask, and where it came from. She began to stare at the mask and marvel at it. It seemed so delicate, yet strangely beautiful. She was having a hard time imagining such a face to be that of what many believed to be a "demon." Hanabi began to become infatuated with the mask, her eyes began to haze a bit and she almost seemed to be in a trance. She began to reach for the mask. It seemed to nice, it couldn't hurt to try it on and look at it in the mirror she thought. Hinata wasn't around, and she could put it back on the bed without her even knowing.

Before she realized it Hanabi had already picked up the mask and she could have sworn she had felt what felt like a pulse from the mask when she picked it up. She slowly began to bring the mask up to her face, when...

112312221.content:
Naruto opens the door to his apartment to find Sakura standing there. "Hey there Sakura, what brings you over here?" asked Naruto. "Hello Naruto, I was sent here by the Hokage to deliver you message. She has a mission for you over in Suna to help Gaara out. They are opening a new ninja academy building and wanted the hero of the 4th Great Ninja War to be there." replied Sakura. "That's great!" exclaimed Naruto getting excited. "I haven't seen Gaara since the war ended. It should be great!" he said. He invites Sakura in to gather some of his things.

"Kakashi-sensei apologizes about sending you out on another mission so soon after coming back from your trip, he said the mission should only take a few days." said Sakura. "Eh its no problem if its to help out Gaara." said Naruto with a laugh. "That reminds me, how was your trip Naruto? I know you were going to see if you could find out some information about your clan." said Sakura. Naruto, then looks a little surprised. He almost forgot about the Kaguya mask and jutsu when Sakura came over. He only remembered when she brought up the trip. He looks over to part of the room and saw the mask still sitting on top of the jutsu array. He then starts to think if he should tell Sakura about the mask and jutsu. If the mask really contained Kaguya's power, it could be potentially dangerous to leave around in his apartment. He then began to come up with an idea, he could leave it in Sakura's care until he could figure out what to do with it when he came back. He and Sakura were teammates, close friends, and had fought Kaguya together. If anyone knew the terrible power it contained, it was her.

Naruto was so lost in his thoughts, it was only until Sakura knocked him on the shoulder that he snapped out of it. "Oh, sorry Sakura, I was just thinking of something." He then began to tell her of the shrine, the scroll containing the jutsu, and the accidental mask he created. Sakura was shocked from what she heard. She couldn't believe such a jutsu existed. It was then Naruto asked her to keep the Kaguya mask safe until he returned. He mentioned that it held a great power, and was afraid of it falling into the wrong hands.

Naruto picked the mask up and gave it to Sakura. The minute she touched it, she could've sworn she felt a slight pulse come from the mask. Sakura thought she was imagining it, and figured it was just some nerves at the thought of Kaguya. After Naruto finished packing they both said their good byes and headed there separate ways. Naruto to see Hokage so he could start his mission, and Sakura headed home so she could keep the mask safe.

11231231.content:
The mask and scroll sat for years undisturbed in the hidden room of the Naka Shrine almost long forgotten. That was how it always been since it was stored away by Naruto and Sasuke all those years ago. At least, until today. The door to the room slid open, and the lights in the room illuminated. In doorway, Sarada Uchiha enters the hidden room. She had recently discovered the Shrine when she exploring the Uchiha district of the Leaf Village. She wanted to find details of her Uchiha lineage and ended up at the ruins of the once proud Naka Shrine. Exploring the rubble of what was left, she a displaced Tatami mat on the floor. Being the curious one, she moved the mat and discovered a hallway that lead to a stone door. She made her way to the door, and with all her strength was able to force the door open.

With a rumble, the door opens to room and the torches begin to illuminate the darkness. When Sarada entered, she saw a stone tablet written writing she had never seen before, a scroll hanging on the wall, and a mask of someone with delicate facial features, white hair, red lips, and a vertical slit on its forehead. Walking over, she glanced at the tablet and saw it was in language she couldn't make out. Deciding that it could be looked into another day, she went over to the scroll and picked it up. She unravels the scroll and begins to read its contents. She learns of the Uzumaki history that it contained and of a mask jutsu that could physically change the body to become a complete clone of who it was based off of. This seemed to interest Sarada. Could such a jutsu really work? The more she thought about it, the more she became curious to try it for herself.

Sarada began to wonder who to make mask of, when she looked up at the wall and saw the mask again. Was that mask made with the jutsu she wondered? Who was it a mask of, and why was it down here with the scroll? Well maybe I could try that one as a test, it couldn't hurt right? It was then Sarada decided..
11231231.title: Sarada Uchiha

choices: Sarada successfully overcomes and ignores the Kaguya Mask's influence.
Sarada is overcome and corrupted by the Kaguya Mask's influence.
112312311.content:
Sarada reached up against the wall, stretching out her arm, Catching the edge of the Kaguya mask with her fingers she clasped lightly and pulled the mask down from it's peach on the wall above.
Slowly Sarada flipped the Kaguya mask around, gripping it tightly she brought it closer to her face. A faint ominous pulse emanated from it. Her eyes glazed over gradually. Her breathing grew slow and heavy. As she drew the mask closer and closer she could feel her hot breath bounce off the smooth inner surface. Sarada's hands shock wildly as the pulse became stronger, calling out to her. Unable to restrain herself any longer Sarada slammed the Kaguya mask rapidly into her face.

Instantly the Kaguya Mask violently slapped onto Sarada's face as she let out a low loud groan. Stumbling backward she recoiled from the force of the mask impacting her. Clamping firmly around her head the once ornate and delicate mask shuddered and creaked. Small tendrils launched out of the mask latching onto her head. Moaning loudly Sarada could feel chakra being forcefully and rapidly being drawn from within her body. The Mask softened too on a more elastic flesh like feeling. It pressed down roughly on her face, kneading and moulding into her soft facial features. Sarada winced in discomfort as it continued to writhe. Kaguya's bangs began to change and distort. Violently they forced their way into Sarada's scalp, letting out a cry as she distressingly felt them rip into her dark onyx hair. She groaned as the mask's 'hair' progressed and smothered her own, sharply pulling and tugging at her shoulder length hair. Wincing as her own dark onyx hair lengthened, converting to a shimmering silver shade. Sarada suddenly felt a tearing throb. She frantically clamped her hands onto her head tightly, shaking intensely as two small bulges began to protrude from the sides of her head. Unnerving creaking filled the room as the two shifting masses forced their way through the eruption of white hair. The stopped sharply forming two distinct brown appendages.

Sarada continued to clamp her hands firmly around her head as the mask writhed. Distorting deeply atop her distraught expression. Cringeworthly crackling proceeded by sick snapping echoed throughout the shrine's small hidden room as Sarada's jaw violently dislocated. She let out an articulated grunt as it lashed back into place forming into Kaguya's sculpted jawline. Sarada's eyes shuddered in agony as she sensed the immense burden and terrifying force of Kaguya's omnipotent chakra being forcefully funnelled into her adolescent form. She let out an ear-splitting scream , weeping as she regretted donning the mask. Continuing to scream her body burned furiously as the unnatural god-like chakra twisted her. Skin quickly shifted tone from her fair complexion, becoming a soft pale colour.

Beginning to staggering around the tiny hidden room Sarada wrestled against the Kaguya mask, trying to frantically remove it. Her bruised hands pulling madly against the shifting mass that smothered her features. Try as she might it didn't budge. Her tears dripping down the warping surface and onto the matted floor. Sarada's knees let off a nauseating snap causing her to screech in anguish, collapsing to knees. She groaned aloud clenching her teeth as the malevolent chakra adjusted her form. Small grunts escaped her as she trembled, her strained eyes rolling slightly upwards. Aware of the building pressure around her hips she gritted her teeth and braced for the worst. Sarada cried out. The sudden sound of bones crackling and snapping violently apart profoundly reverberated around the cramped hidden chamber. She wept as her hips flared outwards pressing firmly against her light shorts. Soft moans echoed as her rump ballooned to Kaguya's matured proportions pressuring the fabric of her slim shorts. Sarada wailed as her waist fractured disturbingly inwards. Trembling her spine cracked savagely lengthened, snapping her back excruciatingly inwards revealing a refined curve.

Sarada trembled, trying to compel herself to her feet. Dragging herself up she staggered to her feet. Taking a few steps slowly forward, the mask still writhing and changing her. She slowed further as her thighs throbbed, burning as they flesh out. Sarada panted as a loud crunch resounded from her knees, toppling her over harshly onto the matted floor. Hitting the floor with a thud she rolled over onto her back. Her limbs clicked and cracked making sickening grinding sounds as they grated together, her petite frame violently unwillingly transformed into mature dimensions. Agonised she moaned forcibly arching her back to jut her chest forward as she could feel a sensation welling within her. Her bosoms swelled briskly, stretching and straining the sleeved qipao dress's material the outfit becoming smaller and similar an ill-fitting t-shirt.

Sarada panted loudly sweat dripping down her unsteady body as Kaguya's chakra had forged her into resembling Kaguya's developed appearance. Continuing to course throughout her body Sarada flinched as the changes had not yet concluded., again grabbing her pounding head as the writhing mask settled atop her face. Abruptly Sarada thrashed violently, shrieking out a deep unidentified outcry. Her eyes frantically zipped around in their sockets promptly changing to sharingan tomoe, which quickly burnt away into blank irises. Her veins surrounding them protruded prominently as her eyes twitched. Blood trickled down her face. A vast surge of raw energy spewed out consuming Sarada as snapping open the Rinne sharingan took hold. Her tattered dress and strained shorts evaporated, exposing Sarada extremely briefly. Kaguya's high-collared hime-kimono formed concealing her from sight.

Fading away and growing dim the beam of light dissipated revealing in it's place a prominent silhouette. No longer stood Sarada in the hidden Naka shrine room. Rather the imposing and menacing figure of Kaguya Ootsutsuki. Sarada slowly raised her hands to her face panting lightly as she in a state of shock glared at herself. Letting out a soft sigh trying to realise what had just happened to her. She stumbled forward slightly, collapsing onto her knees. Her face contorted with horror as she could feel Kaguya's almighty chakra empowering her, but encroaching upon her psyche was the overwhelming foreboding force of Kaguya whispering over her shoulder.
112312311.title: Sarada tries on the mask of Kaguya.

112312312.content:
Sarada looked at the mask, and began to have second thoughts. While the mask did look beautiful to her, she had no idea who it was of and why it was down here with the scroll in the first place. Thinking that maybe if she wanted to test this jutsu, that maybe creating a mask of someone she knew first would be a better choice. With that idea in place, Sarada rolled the scroll back up and placed it in her bag she brought with her. She left the mask in the secret room, thinking that if her first test was successful, that maybe she would come back one day for it. She then exited the room and sealed the stone door shut again.

Sarada made her way back to her house. She went in and saw a note on the counter from her mother Sakura. It said she had to head out on a mission away from the village for a couple of days with Ino and Hinata, and would be back soon. It said she was sorry, and that she pre-made some dinners for Sarada to heat up. She was a little sad her Mama wouldn't be around for a bit saddened her, but realizing that this was a perfect chance to try the jutsu out knowing she had the house to herself. Sarada ran up to her room and shut her door. She opened the scroll again and setup the jutsu array needed to create a mask. With everything set up, she thought who to make a mask of...
112312312.title: Take the scroll with her to create her own mask...

choices: Placed the mask to her face
1123123121.content:
Sarada began to think of who to make a mask of. She thought of all the people she admired and would want to be like. For a moment the image of their 7th Hokage Naruto Uzumaki popped in her head and she blushed. Ever since the incident with the Shin Uchiha clones and the events from the chunnin exams, Sarada developed a bit of a crush on their Hokage. She always knew it was a kids crush and that nothing could ever come of it, but it never stopped her from fantasizing. She knew he was almost three times her age, and would always just see her as his best friend's daughter, plus he had his beautiful wife Hinata at his side. Why would he want her. She became jealous of Hinata for a moment. If only he could look at me like he does her. Even for one day, that's all I would need. Feeling a bit saddened she looked back at the array and instantly an idea popped into her head. If I could be Hinata for that day, maybe I could still get my day just yet!

With that Sarada put her plan in action. She knew where Hinata lived from being teammates with Boruto. She made it to the house in no time flat and without being seen. Luckily the house was empty at the time giving Sarada the opportunity to sneak in. She found her way to Hinata's and Naruto's bedroom. She entered and made her way to a dresser in the room. She looked around and found a brush that she assumed Hinata always used. She inspected the brush and was excited to find a piece of hair needed to create the mask. She was about to leave when she thought she might need to steal one of Hinata's outfits as to not draw suspicion when she transformed. She went through some more drawers until she found the outfit she usually saw Hinata in (http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/naru...). She grabbed the clothes and some underwear that would fit. She sweat dropped a bit when she questioned how she would fill out these proportions. Not wanting to waste anymore time, she packed everything up and left the room exactly as she found it.

Sarada ran back home as quick as possible. The thrill of breaking into Naruto's house for materials and making the mask was really pumping her up. She got home and ran straight to the room. She placed the piece of Hinata's hair and activated the jutsu. In a puff a smoke, gone was the hair and in its place was a mask exactly in the likeness of Hinata. It had fair skin, empty eye holes, and dark blue hair framed the sides. Her excitement was at all time high looking at the mask. She then picked it up in her hands and...
1123123121.title: Hinata

choices: Places the Kaguya Mask on Hinata's mask atop her face.
Ignores the Kaguya mask proceeding to change into Hinata's clothes.
11231231211.content:
Sarada picked up the Hinata mask in her hands. She could feel it's warm weight in her hands. It emanating an affectionate pulse as she flipped the mask over, gripping it tightly. Staring at the smooth inner surface she began to raise it towards her face. Her breathing grew slow and heavy. As she drew it closer still she could feel her hot breath rebound back at her. Sarada's hands shook lightly as the caring pulse became stronger. Hovering the mask above her face Sarada yelled at the top of her voice. “Oh I can't take this any more!” Slamming the mask harshly into her face.

Instantly the Hinata mask violently latched onto Sarada's face as she let out a low groan. Staggering backwards she winced from the force of the mask slapping into her. Clamping firmly onto her head the formerly ornate mask throbbed, creaking loudly throughout Sarada's room. Small tendrils launched out of the mask latching and grabbing coarsely onto strands of hair. Moaning softly Sarada could feel her chakra being gently but rapidly drawn from with her body. The mask softened to a more spongy flesh like feeling as it pressed down forcibly onto her face. Kneading and moulding at her soft facial features Sarada winced in discomfort, Hinata's features forcefully contorting her own.

“G-gah!” Sarada cried out, clamping her hands firmly around her head. “This isn't as enjoyable as I expected it to be!” Suddenly Hinata's mask's bangs warped and distorted propelling themselves violently into Sarada's scalp. “A-argh!” she screamed letting out a cry as she felt them distressingly tunnel into her scalp, ripping away at her own dark onyx hair. Sarada groaned as the mask's 'hair' smothered her own locks, sharply pulling and tugging at her shoulder length hair. Whining as her hair lengthened ever so slightly level with her shoulders, taking on a slightly darker blue shade becoming much more refined and silky smooth. While still grasping her head the mask distorted deeply atop her somewhat anguish expression. Cringeworthy cracks echoed around Sarada's room as sick snapping signalled her jaw forcibly dislocating. She let out an muffled grunt as it snapped back into place, showing off Hinata's delicate jawline.

Sarada shuddered as she could feel Hinata's invigorating chakra being funnelled into her adolescent form, warming and filling her with strength. Her body began to burn slightly as she could feel Hinata's chakra flooding throughout her body, shifting her fair complexion to a lighter tinge. Unexpectedly Sarada's eyes shuddered in agony. Her strained, bloodshot eyes speedily warped into sharingan tomoe only to dissipate instantly. Veins bulged vividly as Hinata's Byakugan briefly activated for a split second, Sarada shrieked out as her head was overloaded with information. It had taken Hinata years to fully master and develop her Byakugan, however Sarada lacked that training. Tears rolled down her face as she was overwhelmed with the sensory input, dropping to her knees.

Breathing heavily Sarada panted, “W-wha... what was that intense feeling, was that the Hyuga Kekkei Genkai!?” She didn't have time to find answers to her question as she groaned, gritting her teeth as a sizeable pressure built up around her hips. Realising what was happening Sarada quickly closed her eyes and braced herself. Leaning over onto the floor she wrapped her arms around her chest. The sudden sound of bones cracking and snapping apart profoundly reverberated around the bedroom. She cried out as her hips flared outwards pressuring hard against her small shorts, filling them out and straining the fabric. “U-uhh ahhhh!” Sarada moaned as her rump ballooned to Hinata's motherly proportions, beginning to tear the slim shorts apart. Sarada howled as her waist fractured distressful inwards. Shaking her spine cracked savagely lengthening, snapping her back excruciatingly inwards revealing a refined curve.

Rolling over onto her back Sarada could still feel the mask writhing and transforming her, clamping down even more firmly and tightly. She shook as her thighs throbbed fleshing out, her knees popping. Her limbs clicked and cracked producing sickening grinding sounds as they ground together, her petite frame violently convulsed transforming into matured motherly dimensions. Letting out a strained moan she arched her back jutting her torso forward as a warming feeling welled in her chest. Her bosoms swelled briskly, quickly straining the sleeved qipao dress. “I-it's getting rather tight and un-uncomfortable!” Sarada panted as her chest continued to press and tear her dress. Stopping expanding just before the material gave way the top resembled an ill-fitting crop-top, barely just able to hold Hinata's well developed bosom.

Gradually picking herself up off the bedroom floor, Sarada stumbled towards her mirror. Her feet tripping up on themselves not used to being this tall. Her balance unsteady from Hinata's sizeable rump and bosom. Clumsily Sarada collapsed on top of her drawer, Hinata's voluptuous bosom cushioning them impact. Blushing a little she braced herself up with her arms and gazed into the mirror. The mask slowly finally finished writhing into place and clamped firmly settling on Sarada's face. She felt awash with Hinata's memories and feelings as they compiled atop and partly replaced her own. “Is this really me?” Sarada questioned, gingerly grabbing the soft blushed cheeks. “I never realised how gorgeous Mrs Uzumaki was, she looks so calm and gentle.”

She sighed loudly “That idiot Boruto and Hinawari are so lucky!” Backing off slightly from the desktop mirror Sarada could begin to feel her former tattered clothes slip down Hinata's body slightly. Remembering she 'borrowed' a pair of Hinata's clothes she scuttled carefully over to her bed, not wanting to experience an extremely embarrassing wardrobe malfunction. On her bed she noticed laying in a pile next to it were her stashed folded up copy of Hinata's outfit, as well as the delicate white mask she had found with the scroll. She leant forward picking up gently the Kaguya mask in her hands. An ominous pulse emanated from the pale yet strangely graceful mask. Sarada flipped the Mask around in her hands stare into the smooth inside contours.
11231231211.title: Places the Hinata mask onto her face.

Seal the scroll and the mask away in the chest.
11231233.content:
It was Naruto Uzumaki, the new 7th Hokage. After years of the mask being in storage in the shrine, Naruto decided to move it back to his new place of residence with his family. Considering the jutsu scroll was a precious Uzumaki family heirloom and piece of history, Naruto decided to move it to his new place for safe keeping. He had thanked Sasuke for taking on the burden of its safe keeping and brought back the mask and scroll to his new home.

Once Naruto brought it home, he went straight to the storage room of its house. Sitting in the room was a chest that he had constructed of strong chakra infused wood. Sitting on top of the chest was a special sealing tag of his design. He had done all of this in preparation of today.

Naruto quickly removed the seal tag and opened the wooden chest. No one was currently home but to Naruto, having around the scroll and the Kaguya mask in open was a little unnerving. As he was about to put the scroll and mask in the chest, he looked down and stared down at the items he held. In his left hand was the scroll with the knowledge to create masks, in his right was the mask of the mother of all chakra and the most fearsome opponent he had ever faced. He could've sworn he felt a pulse like sensation come from the Kaguya mask, as he continued to stare at the items. His eyes starting to haze over. To an outside observer it looked like he was standing in trance like state.

Naruto's mind started to wander. His thoughts flooding with the idea of using the mask. He began to think back to when he first created the mask, he had never really tested to see if the transformation even worked. Plus even if it did work, he was the Hokage now, if anyone in the village could control the masks awesome power, it was him. Plus all it would take was a reversal seal tag and he would be back to normal. He would be lying if he wasn't the least bit curious to see what having the body of another person would be like. What could possibly go wrong?

The idea that once would've seemed crazy, seemed now so enticing. In most cases Naruto would've never even thought to try on the mask, but little to his knowledge, the mask had other plans. While not sentient, the masks still held the desire to worn. From the moment Naruto first touched the mask at the shrine, it began its work. It released a minute amount of chakra into Naruto, that was sent directly to his subconscious. Like a subtle genjutsu, it secretly was planting the idea and curiosities of using the mask. To wear it and experience the transformation into another being. After directly holding it for the long, the mask finally sent out a pulse to activation it's subtle suggestion and have Naruto become it's wearer.

Naruto couldn't get the thought of using the mask out of his, he just couldn't deal with it anymore. It was with that final though he decided to...
11231233.title: The 7th Hokage Naruto

With all his will power he slammed the mask in scroll into the chest. Closed it up, and then applied the seal. Instantly once he did, his mind began to clear and the idea of using the mask seemed less appealing. He let out a sigh. Naruto couldn't believe the degree of influence the mask exerted on him. He was only just holding the thing, god forbid he actually wore it. Naruto let out a shudder. He didn't even want to imagine it. With the events of the mask behind them, Naruto just realized how much time had passed since he went to shrine. He had an meeting with Gaara, who had come to visit, in ten minutes. He would have to rush if wanted to get to the Hokage building on time to meet him. With that he bolted out of the room, closing the door behind him.

Naruto rushed out of his and sped back to work. In his haste though, Naruto failed to realize that door to the storage room had failed to close completely and was left unlocked.

As questions of whether or not to wear the Tsunade mask swirled around his head, Naruto ultimately came to the conclusion that maybe he should hold off on it for now. Putting some more thought about it, Naruto knew Tsunade was very much a woman, and with him being a guy, Naruto was unsure of what a transformation into a female via the mask might bring. Still curious to see if the mask worked though, Naruto came up with a new idea. Maybe he could convince his girlfriend Hinata to try it on. If there was anyone he trusted with knowledge of the mask, it was her. Plus, yhey were both female, so perhaps it might be more compatible. With his mind made up, Naruto packed the Uzumaki mask scroll, along with the Tsunade mask up in a back pack and decided to head over to Hinata's to see if he can find her. In his excitement though, Naruto forgot to fully secure the top of his bag. Closing the door behind him, Naruto started to make his way over to see his girlfriend. Wanting to take the quickest way there, he decided make his way via the use of building roof tops.

Before he knew it, Naruto was already at the door of Hinata's home. He knocked on the door and was greeted by Hinata. She was excited to see her boyfriend and quickly gave him a kiss and invited him in. Naruto noticed that the place seemed empty. Hinata then mentioned how she was watching the house while her father and sister were out on a diplomatic mission. The two of them decided to head back to Hinata's room. Naruto in a bit of panic looked to Hinata and told her that they needed to find the mask and how it might've fallen out somewhere along the way. Not wanting the mask to fall in the wrong hands, they get ready and head out in search of the missing mask.

A person was sitting on the benches in the village when they felt something hit them on the head from above and fall on the ground. When the person looked down they noticed what looked like the backside of mask laying face down on the ground. They picked it up and dusted it off before saying, "Huh, this mask looks a bit like the Tsunade."

The mask was found by someone, but who?

I could possibly use this to my advantage. With it I could make Sakura forget she even saw me as Sasuke! I can send her home and no one it happened!" It was the perfect idea, he thought. With that Naruto stopped by, the Hyuga Clan Residence to look for her. He gets to house, and knocks on the door. After a moment it opens revealing Hanabi, Hinata's younger sister. I wanted to talk to her." "Sure," said Hanabi, "I'll go grab her, give me one second." Hanabi turned and ran back into the house. As she ran back in a couple of loose strands of her brown hair fell from the comb that was in her hand. Noticing this, Naruto quickly picked them up and stored it in pocket. He could always add another mask to his collection in the future.

After a minute, he saw Hinata come out of the house. "Naruto, I wasn't expecting to see you today. Did you just come back from your trip to the Uzumaki Mask Shrine?" Hinata asked. "Yeah, I did earlier today. I stopped back at my apartment first to drop off some stuff. I was hoping if you weren't busy, you could come by and I could show you what I found!" Said Naruto excitedly. Blushing a little, even after dating for almost year, the prospect of being alone with Naruto always made her flustered. Especially, since as of late, they had begun to have a more physical relationship. "Sure!" she replied. Hinata strapped on her sandals and left with Naruto.

They make it back to his apartment and he begins to tell Hinata of his trip. He mentions the scroll and tells her of his family history. He then brings up the mask jutsu and tells her all about it. To say she was amazed, was an understatement. Hinata couldn't believe that such a technique existed. She knew in the wrong hands it could be a dangerous technique, especially the risks that came with it. Hinata then asked if he created any masks yet, and Naruto showed her the Sasuke and Sakura mask. Telling her what had happened earlier.

"Wow," said Hinata, "That's some story Naruto." "You're telling me," he said. "It was weird, but kind of cool transforming into someone else. Kind of an out-of-body experience you know." Hinata began to blush when a thought came to her head. She then asked Naruto, "Wait if you tried the Sasuke mask, have you tried the mask of Sakura?" "No!" said Naruto. "I haven't. I was nervous about doing something like that. Being physically transformed into girl is whole lot different than imitating one through an illusion. I was actually hoping maybe you might want to try it out, since you are already a girl." Hinata was a little saddened, did Naruto not like her appearance and still preferred Sakura? Seeing the look on her face, realized what was on her mind and went to reassure her. "Hinata, I don't want you to think I prefer Sakura, over you or anything. I think you are and will always be the most beautiful girl out there. No one could compare, I just thought it was a cool jutsu and that could share it with you. If it's too weird, we can forget about it." Said Naruto. Realizing Naruto would always love her, and was just excited over a new jutsu, Hinata smiled as she felt relieved. She always knew he would love her, just as she loved him. She was about to say she would try the mask when Naruto said, "If you want I'll try the Sasuke mask on again, that way we can try it together." Touched by the sentiment, Hinata replies..

Once the smoke dissipated, what was left were to masks on the floor. What Naruto saw were the mask forms of the two people he could never forget, his parents.

info.brief_description: Naruto discovers a new Jutsu in the old Uzumaki Mask Shrine.
info.description:
After learning of his family heritage and having dealt with the threat of Kaguya Ootsutsuki, Naruto decides to take some time to wander the old ruins of the old Uzumaki Mask Shrine in search of some information of his clan. While wandering around the shrine, Naruto discovers a new Jutsu that allows for him to create special clone transformation masks of people.

(The time setting is that of after Manga Chapter 699, but can also be after the events of Naruto the Movie: The Last. If you want to jump to after the Boruto movie, go for it as well.)

He discovers that as long as he is able to gather some form of their DNA (Hair, blood, etc) or chakra, he can create special masks that allow the wearer of said mask to physically transform into an exact clone of who ever the mask was modeled after. (Think of the masks from Majora's Mask for an idea of what the style of the transformation masks would look like).

The wearer of the mask can only return to normal by applying a special seal tag to the forehead of the mask wearer. From here the transformation of the wearer's body would be reversed, allowing for the mask to then be removed from the wearer. The transformation has a trade off though, the wearer will gradually take on the personality of the mask, and after three full days of wearing the mask, the transformation will become virtually permanent with the wearer becoming an exact clone of the mask. Most wearers end up becoming lost in their new personality and only those with a strong sense of will can remember their lives prior to mask at that point. The only hope of returning to their an original body at that point is if a powerful Uzumaki is able to infuse their potent chakra into the seal tag and separate the mask from the user.

(I was really inspired by the mask transformation sequences from Majora's Mask when it came to the jutsu. I was thinking it would look similar in style to the Majora's mask transformation, but with the body visibly changing physically. As to how it feels during the change, I just put some thought into that. To the outside observer, it might appear as a painful process, but to the wearer it would actually be that of a pleasurable one. Knowing that a physical change of their bodies would be painful, the Uzumaki implemented in the jutsu a way for the wearer's pain receptors in the brain to be dulled and for the pleasure sensors to be triggered to help ease through the transformation. Sure once the wearer first puts the mask on and the transformation begins, it might be painful in the beginning as they feel their body begin to shift to it's new form, but it soon transitions to that of pleasure. I'd imagine it to be the same way with either a transformation of the same gender or that of one to another. I was thinking thats one way in some users become addicted to the use of the masks and not only the feeling of having a new body and being a different person, but also the feeling from the transformation itself. This can lead the story into some situations that might be a little NSFW, but hey that's for however the contributor wants to go with it.)

Who will Naruto create masks of? Who will wear those masks? What fun, or disaster will come from this new technique?

Feel free to add to the story. Additions are always welcome.
